body.p: The following are examples of symbols used on the reactor or accessories to alert you to important information:

image.href: C:\Users\e9921013\backup\GIT\GIT DITA Maps\PDI\PDI Revised Files Ready for GIT\WR22033 0000012241_P-164001115 Aggregator Reactor (2500A) Installation Manual\Graphics\specSymElectricShock.pdf

entry.p: RISK OF ELECTRIC SHOCK - Observe the warning associated with the risk of electric shock symbol.

image.href: C:\Users\e9921013\backup\GIT\GIT DITA Maps\PDI\PDI Revised Files Ready for GIT\WR22033 0000012241_P-164001115 Aggregator Reactor (2500A) Installation Manual\Graphics\specSymCaution.pdf

entry.p: CAUTION: REFER TO OPERATOR'S MANUAL - Refer to your operator's manual for additional information, such as important operating and maintenance instructions.

image.href: C:\Users\e9921013\backup\GIT\GIT DITA Maps\PDI\PDI Revised Files Ready for GIT\WR22033 0000012241_P-164001115 Aggregator Reactor (2500A) Installation Manual\Graphics\specSymBatteryDisposalWEEE.pdf

row.entry: This symbol indicates that you should not discard waste electrical or electronic equipment (WEEE) in the trash. For proper disposal, contact your local recycling/reuse or hazardous waste center.
